title: Sound does not work if anything else uses sound
body:
When i start up a lol game i always have no sound if anything else is using sound, for example teamspeak or media player or a youtube vid in the background, when this happens, even closing the game then relogging into that same game does not fix it, even after stopping any other sounds

all my other computers sounds works fine and this doesnt happen to any other game

ive made sure programs cannot take control of my audio devices

using a wireless headset, made sure its set to default

replies.body:
I'm not familiar with this issue, but I have a few suggestions;

* When in game (create a Custom match) disable and reenable in-game audio
* Perform a client repair by clicking the question mark on the top right of your launcher
* Update, reinstall, or roll back your audio driver
* Run the game as an admin (right click shortcut and select Run as Admin)

im always running as admin, normal launch doesnt start game at all, repaired client already, updated driver after this happened to no avail, and ive disabled and re enabled sound many times with no effect
